Package simulator.framework

Provides the core infrastructure for simulating the network and elevator.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Parser  
TimeSensitive Allows simulator components to execute at specified time intervals.
 

Class Summary
AbstractTimer Allows elevator modules to schedule themselves to execute at specified times in the future.
Button  
CarButton  
Controller The Controller object provides an abstract framework that you will use to build your distributed elevator controllers.
ControllerBuilder Utility class for instantiating controllers from the .cf file for unit and integration tests.
ControllerSet Collection of controllers indexed by name.
Elevator Provides command-line interface to and instantiates all objects for the Elevator simulation.
FaultInjector Responsible for creating and injecting fault objects as defined by the fault file (-ff).
FileTokenizer This is the class responsible for processing files.
HallButton  
Harness Allows the elevator components to interact with each other through a shared event queue.
Logger Utility class for logging functionality
MessageInjector This class is responsible for parsing mf files and creating the objects that do the actual message injections and assertion monitoring.
PassengerController The driver for all the Passengers in the simulations.
PassengerInjector Parses the -pf file and creates passenger objects accordingly.
PassengerParser Parses the -pf file and creates passenger objects accordingly.
ProgressLogger Prints out a log message periodically so that the simulator progress can be observed if no logging messages are being printed.
ReflectionFactory A facade that provides a simple interface for instantiating objects, finding methods, and invoking methods.
ReplicationComputer This is a utility class that provides methods for the consistent generation of offsets for replicated controllers.
RuntimeMonitor This class provides a basic framework for implementing runtime monitors.
SwingDisplay a GUI display that shows the elevator state during the simulation and allows the user to adjust the speed of the simulation.
SystemTimer This class implements timer functionality for the system queue.
Timer Timer for simulation objects.
 

Enum Summary
Button.State  
Direction  
DoorCommand Commands given to the DoorMotor object.
Hallway Hallway constants correspond to the front and back doors on the elevator and elevator shaft/landings.
MessageContext  
PassengerController.PassengerState  
Side Constant values for door and door sensor replication.
Speed Speed commands for the drive motor.
 

Package simulator.framework Description

Provides the core infrastructure for simulating the network and elevator. This package provides facilities for components to send messages to each other through a central network, all file I/O, and external simulation stimuli.
